titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, and his Councell of Warre, on behalfe of themselves and the whole armie; shewing the grounds of their present advance towards the city of London. By the appointment of his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax and his Councell of Warre. Signed Io. Rushworth Secr.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
